d:entry.d:title: Dictionary application
d:entry.p: An application to look up dictionary on Mac OS X.
d:entry.span: The Dictionary application first appeared in Tiger.
It's application icon looks like below.

ol.li:
Form by putting parts together or combining substances; construct; create; produce : Mother made her a beautiful dress
.

Cause to be or become : The news made me happy
.

div.div: make it : succeed in something; survive.

ul.li: Hal is referring to the fact that the office he's in is decorated with art by Frederic Remington (1861-1909), an American painter whose work can be seen online here

d:entry.d:title: Front/Back Matter
d:entry.div: This is a front matter page of the sample dictionary.

To see this page,
Open "Go" menu.
Choose "Front/Back Matter" menu item. If it has sub-menu items, choose one of them.

To prepare the menu item, do the followings.
Prepare this page source as an entry.
Add "DCSDictionaryFrontMatterReferenceID" key and its value to the plist of the dictionary. The value should be the string of this page entry id.
